text: Today we announced further positive preclinical data of #CVnCoV in non-human primates demonstrating full protection of the lungs during a challenge study at a low dose of our #mRNA #COVID19 #vaccine candidate. The full manuscript is available on bioRxiv. ➡️https://t.co/ORhAiq5RBb https://t.co/GUKXh0Cq54
